member.name: T:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Adaptive.AdaptivePlugin
member.summary: Provides an optional plugin to connect the SmoothStreamingMediaElement to the MediaPlayer

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Adaptive.AdaptivePlugin.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of AdaptivePlugin.

member.name: P:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Adaptive.AdaptivePlugin.Manager
member.summary: Gets the AdaptiveStreamingManager instance used to broker communication between the SmoothStreamingMediaElement and the MediaPlayer

member.name: P:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Adaptive.AdaptivePlugin.AutoRestrictTracks
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to automatically restrict tracks unsuitable for platform and device. Sometimes the app knows best and should perform this duty itself.

member.name: P:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Adaptive.AdaptivePlugin.StartupBitrate
member.summary: Gets or sets the startup bitrate to be used. This is useful for starting at a higher quality when you know the user has a good connection.

member.name: P:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Adaptive.AdaptivePlugin.DownloaderPlugin
member.summary: Gets or set the DownloaderPlugin to be used. This is a class that allows you to intercept each request to the Smooth Streaming SDK before it tries to process the data. Note: IDownloaderPlugin just adapts ISmoothStreamingCache to use the async/await pattern.

member.name: P:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Adaptive.AdaptivePlugin.SSME
member.summary: Gets the underlying SmoothStreamingMediaElement being used by this plugin.

member.name: T:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Adaptive.AudioStreamWrapper
member.summary: Wraps a smooth streaming StreamInfo class to allow it to inherit AudioStream and participate in the player framework's audio selection APIs.

member.name: P:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Adaptive.AudioStreamWrapper.AdaptiveAudioStream
member.summary: Gets the underlying smooth streaming StreamInfo instance.

member.name: T:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Adaptive.SmoothStreamingMediaElementWrapper
member.summary: Provides a wrapper around the SmoothStreamingMediaElement to adapt it to the IMediaElement interface.

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Adaptive.SmoothStreamingMediaElementWrapper.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of SmoothStreamingMediaElementWrapper

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Adaptive.SmoothStreamingMediaElementWrapper.IsSmoothStreaming(System.Uri)
member.summary: Returns whether the source Uri is thought to be a smooth streaming manifest (ends in '/manifest').
member.returns: True means, the uri will be treated as a smooth streaming manifest.
